description: This Java class defines the service layer for task management in a backend application, providing methods to create, list, retrieve, update, and delete tasks associated with users.

classes.name: TaskService
classes.description: Service layer class for handling task-related operations including creation, retrieval, updating, listing, and deletion of tasks.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new task for a specified user based on the provided request data.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves all tasks associated with a specified user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific task by ID for a user, if it exists.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing task's details for a user based on provided data.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a task for a user by ID, returning true if successful.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a Task entity to a TaskResponse DTO for external use.
